effects:
Gain access to following skills for 3 turns:
	Hazardous Shell+1 (504850)
	Hyper NulAll+1 (504860)
	Sunburst+1 (504840)
	Ultra Potion+1 (504870)
name: Synthesis

desc_short.0: Enable sunburst, hazardous shell, hyper nulall, and ultra potion for three turns
desc_short.5: Aprende Supernova, Proyectil letal, OmniAntiTodo+ y Ultrapoción durante 3 turnos
